New Records: Dansby Swanson has set his season high with 4 hits. His previous season high was 3 hits.
Dansby Swanson has set his career high with 4 hits. His previous career high was 3 hits.
Key Match Events: The Cubs notched their 6th straight victory
Post-Match Reflections: The Nationals fell as the Cubs won
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread and they did
The over/under was 9 and the teams scored 15 runs, so people who bet the over won
Seiya Suzuki has reached 75 doubles in his career
Others: The game was played at Nationals Park in Washington, DC
The final score was 14-1 in favor of the Cubs
